value.name: Kelly Osbourne says she’s ‘proud to be a nepo baby’
value.description: Kelly Osbourne has hit back at critics who have called her a “nepo baby” by saying she’s “proud” of that status. Osbourne, 39, is the daughter of Black Sabbath frontman Ozzy Osbourne and his manager Sharon Osbourne. She first shot to fame in 2002 when the family appeared together on the groundbreaking MTV reality show The Osbournes.

video.name: Kelly Osbourne opens up about father Ozzy Osbourne's Parkinson's diagnosis

value.name: It’s 2024 and Piers Morgan is still talking about Meghan Markle
value.description: A leopard never changes its spots and that’s certainly true of Piers Morgan, who can’t seem to let go of his obsession with Meghan Markle. It is now 2024 yet the TalkTV host, 58, apparently had nothing better to discuss than a two-year-old feud with the Duchess of Sussex, 42, and her husband Prince Harry, 39.

value.name: Meghan Markle ‘set for return’ to acting in Suits creator's new spin-off
value.description: The recent reunion of the Suits cast at the Golden Globes has sparked renewed interest in the hit series, especially in light of rumors about a new LA-based spin-off show that intriguingly includes a character seemingly crafted for Meghan Markle .

value.name: Prince William Visited Kate Middleton in the Hospital After Her Surprise Surgery
value.description: Prince William is stepping up to the plate as a supportive husband after it was announced that Kate Middleton was hospitalized following an abdominal surgery. The royal was spotted leaving the private hospital on Thursday — in an Audi e-Tron GT Carbon Vorsprung, to be exact — after a "low-key visit," according to The Independent.

value.description: A reboot of the series that shot the Duchess of Sussex to fame features Erica — and has got the entertainment industry talking about a possible return

value.description: Fans of the Sussexes appeared to take aim at the Princess of Wales and a royal commentator has hit out at them branding their comments "disgusting".

value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry have experienced considerable ups and downs with their popularity since they stepped back from their institutional roles.
